original_text: You have declared this day that the Lord is your God and that you will walk in obedience to him, that you will keep his decrees, commands and laws—that you will listen to him.
korean_text: 네가 오늘 여호와를 네 하나님으로 인정하고 또 그 도를 행하고 그의 규례와 명령과 법도를 지키며 그의 소리를 들으라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord is your God
and that you will walk in obedience to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 그에게 순종하며 행할 것임을

sentences.original_text: that you will keep his decrees
that you will listen to him
